data:item.name: frdmhb2002esevm motor control demo app
data:item.display_title: FRDMHB2002ESEVM: Driver and demo app for MC33HB2002ES H-bridge motor controller
data:item.overview: This demo application provides various Motor Control interfaces like fault detection (over, under voltage and active current limits etc ) , Fault detection control and Motor can be either control by PWM or SPI. Using PWM speed can be controlled by changing the duty cycles.
